mema chithrapataye githa 04 k athulathwa thibu athara ee pilibandawa thorathuru soya ganimata apahasu wiya.thiragatha wu dinaya – 1983 mayi 20 idiripath kirima - kanfo chithrapata nishpadanaya – pi. ee. rachin chandrasiri, sunil jayasiri, ji. ee. somadasa kathawa, debas, thira natakaya saha adhyakshanaya – wasantha obesekara sama thira natakaya saha sahaya adhyakshanaya – krishti sheltan pranandu sahaya adhyakshana sahaya – nanda withana kamara adhyakshanaya - donald karunarathna sanskaranaya - stanli da alwis sanskarana sahaya – nimal thennakon anga rachanaya - eebat wijesinha kala adhyakshanaya – layanal silwa shabda paripalanaya - ke. pi. ke. balasinham rasayanagara katayuthu - honkon kalar muwi lab sakasuma – wijaya chithragaraya namawaliya - ke. am. hemachandra nishpadana kalamanakaranaya – nanda withana nishchala chayarupa – priyath liyanage sangitha adhyakshanaya - premasiri kemadasa adum nirmanaya ha pracharaka kalamanakaranaya - swarna abesekara widuli karmika sewa - jayawardhana films dhawana kalaya – paya 1 winadi 55 diga pramanaya adi 11512nalu niliyan – rawindra randeniya (jayanath), swarna mallawaaarachchi (rathmali), somi rathnayaka (jakolis), ayirangani serasinha (ganika niwasa palika), rathnawali kakunuwela (rathmalige mawa), shirani kaushalya (renuka), nanda withana (wyaja wiwaha lekam), malaka chathurath (rathmalige puthu), anushi wijegunawardhana, rathmali gunasekara, daya alwis, je. ech. jayawardhana, awanthi aponsu, indira perera, ramani fonseka, kalayil dayas, granwil rudrigumangala darshanaya – chithrapata sansthawe sabhapathi antan wikramasinha mahathage pradhanathwayen kolambaa rigal sinama shalawedi pawathwina.
